title: BEAUTIFUL 3 BED, 2.5 TOWNHSE, 3 LEVELS, AVAIL NOW OR 8/1
posting_body: ['Spacious, sunlit 3 bed, 2.5 bath townhouse with 1', 'garage parking and another in the driveway.', 'Eat in kitchen with granite counters, hardwood floors,', 'living and dining rooms, recessed lighting, central air,', 'cathedral ceiling, palladium window, in unit laundry and yard.', 'Located very convenient to Rt. 95, Rt. 2, shops supermarkets,', 'restaurants, etc.', 'Available now or in August, small dogs and a cat will be', 'considered.', 'Good credit required.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'This unit will not last', 'on the market.', 'There is a real estate fee of $3,200.', 'if you rent this unit.', 'Photos available with email address.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Please reference: 3 bedroom townhouse Waltham,  in your text or message']
